articles.title: The Darkness vocalises its impending return to Destiny 2 - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: An ominous broadcast on Twitter signals that - no matter what happens with Season Of The Worthy's ship-crashing - Destiny is preparing to turn out the lights.
articles.content: Always acting, but never quite seen. It seems one of Destiny 2‘s most elusive antagonists is preparing to finally play its hand. Lurking in the shadows of Bungie’s space-knight loot shooter, The Dark… [+2265 chars]
